title: Structuring the learning environment (TEFC)
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Behavior therapy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Education
description: Episode of Series "Effective Behavioural Programming". Discusses four key points concerning the learning environment for severely and profoundly retarded students: the normalisation model; a ten point plan for increasing behaviour; the reasons why inappropriate behaviours occur; handling disruptive students
